# Mastering Shiny Test Server App Package (`mstsap`)

<!-- badges: start -->

<!-- badges: end -->

`mstsap` is a collection of tests using [`testthat`](https://testthat.r-lib.org/) and [`testServer()`](https://search.r-project.org/CRAN/refmans/shiny/html/testServer.html). 

The modules and applications in `mstsap` come from the [Shiny modules chapter](https://mastering-shiny.org/scaling-modules.html) of [Mastering Shiny](https://mastering-shiny.org/index.html).  

## Installation

```{r}
#| eval: false
#| echo: true
install.packages('remotes')
remotes::install_github(
  "https://github.com/mjfrigaard/sapkgs", ref = "mstsap")
```

## Utility function tests

There is a single utility function in `mstsap`: `find_vars()`

```{r}
#| eval: true
#| echo: false
fs::dir_tree("tests/testthat/", regexp = "find")
```

```{r}
#| eval: false
testthat::test_file("tests/testthat/test-find_vars.R")
```

```{verbatim}
#> [ FAIL 0 | WARN 0 | SKIP 0 | PASS 4 ]
```


## `testServer()` tests

```{r}
#| eval: true
#| echo: false
fs::dir_tree("tests/testthat/", regexp = "Server|App")
```
